title: Stinking Cloud
content:

Stinking Cloud Information

Description: Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures from taking actions. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m 6m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Constitution

How to Acquire Stinking Cloud

Stinking Cloud can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, The Fiend, Circle of the
